entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
